idea:

idea:
Skipstow has its focus on relieving frequent travelers off their luggage duties â€“ packing, unpacking and handling. We make it work in the following steps.
-	Customers send their baggage stuff to us.
-	We maintain (Laundry & storage) their stuff until they need it.
-	We can send some or all of their stuff wherever and whenever they travel.
-	All items are retracted and restored when travelers are done with the trip.
name: Skipstow
